editor.selectFile: Select a file to get started!

fileBrowser.deleteFileConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the file {{filename}}?
fileBrowser.deleteFolderConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the folder {{filename}} and all its contents?

errors.participationNotFound: Your participation could not be found. Please try again shortly or contact your tutor.
errors.saveFailed: One or more files could not be updated. Please try again shortly or contact your tutor.
errors.noPermissions: You don't have the necessary permissions.
errors.checkoutFailed: The checkout of your git repository failed. Please try again shortly or contact your tutor.
errors.fileExists: File/Directory name already exists. Please choose a different name.
errors.unsupportedFile: File with this extension not supported.
errors.fileOperationFailed: File operation could not be executed. Please try again later.

resetRepo.title: Reset your repository.
resetRepo.description:
Your repository is in a conflict state. 
 You can reset the repository to the last successful commit, please be however aware that you will loose any unsaved progress. 
 You can close this modal and copy any unsaved changes from your files and reset the repository later.
resetRepo.confirmCheckbox: I understand this change can't be made undone
